tactic:
induction b with
  | zero => sorry
  | succ n' => sorry
name: zero
goal:
a b : Nat
h : a * b ≠ 0
⊢ (↑a : Int) ≤ (↑a : Int) * (↑b : Int)

tactic:
induction b with
  | zero => sorry
  | succ n' => sorry
name: succ
goal:
a b : Nat
h : a * b ≠ 0
zero : a * 0 ≠ 0 → (↑a : Int) ≤ (↑a : Int) * (↑0 : Int)
⊢ (↑a : Int) ≤ (↑a : Int) * (↑b : Int)
